about_the_game:
Fae & Fauna is an open world creature collecting role-playing game combining the very best elements of the genre!

Craft eggs and hatch magical pets as you explore breath-taking environments teeming with secrets, nooks and crannies around every corner. Every rock, every waterfall, and every patch of grass holds something new for you to uncover!

Each area holds its own unique story and its own history, waiting to be discovered by you!



Hatch! As you adventure you will find certain materials that are used for a particular purpose... Craft mysterious eggs by mixing these materials in different ways, and hatch new pet companions! There are 7 elements and a dozen different types to discover, so keep at it!
Collect them all!



Decorate! Design and decorate your home to reflect your perfect haven. Customize your home with magical furniture, whimsical knicknacks, and charming decorations you’ve picked up along the way. Expand your base to provide a sanctuary for your growing collection of pets, offering them cozy nests, play areas, and more.



Bond! Care for your pets! Play music for them, play with them, feed them or simply head out into the world together! Every moment you spend together will increase your bond with one another. Raise your most favorite friend in the world - and cuddle to your heart's content!


Find Love! Connect with seven captivating characters, where romance can blossom. Create your story, and explore the world of Lunora. Perhaps even with a companion?

name: Fae & Fauna
short_description: Fae & Fauna is an open world pet collecting role-playing game. Collect magical creatures in undiscovered lands and fight with your companions against the dangers lurking in the wilds!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
